entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
